title: Spain grants citizenship to 4,300 with Sephardic Jew roots
text:
Published By: Philly News Nation/World - Today 
MADRID (AP) - Spain has granted citizenship to 4,302 people whose Jewish ancestors fled after being told in 1492 to convert to Catholicism o... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
